name: Aaron Frost
bio: Frosty is an expert developer. His claim to fame is that he is a co-founder of ng-conf. He also recently founded HeroDevs, a developer consulting shop that focuses on expert-level consulting, training, and engineering around Angular. For the last 6 years Frosty has been nominated as a Google Developer Expert in Angular. He is an accomplished and well-traveled conference speaker. And the only hobby he enjoys more than coding is fishing.
